text: Desulfovibrio ferrireducens is a psychrotolerant bacterium from the genus of Desulfovibrio which has been isolated from permanently cold sediments from Fjord in Svalbard. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Desulfovibrio ferrireducens at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Deltaproteobacteria Category:Bacteria described in 2006 Category:Psychrophiles
title: Desulfovibrio ferrireducens
